message.content:
{
  "summary": {
    "focus": "Modern 2025-friendly palettes for tech/SaaS/blog sites with light+dark modes and good accessibility.",
    "guidelines": {
      "primary_usage": "Follow ~60-30-10: ~60% neutral, 30% primary, 10% accent for CTAs/highlights.[1][4]",
      "accessibility": {
        "body_text": "Target WCAG AA contrast ≥ 4.5:1 for normal text, 3:1 for large text.[4][5]",
        "ui_elements": "Ensure buttons, links, inputs meet ≥ 3:1 against their backgrounds.[4][5]",
        "notes": [
          "Avoid very light grays for body text on light backgrounds.",
          "Use strong neutrals for text and soft colors for large surfaces.",
          "Test each final combo with a contrast checker."
        ]
      },
      "trend_notes_2025": [
        "Tech/SaaS commonly uses deep blues, indigos, cyan-leaning blues, cool grays for trust and security.[1][3][5]",
        "Futuristic gradients and AI/sci‑fi tones are trending for hero sections and dark-mode UIs.[1][3][5]",
        "Earthy and humanized palettes (muted clays, olives, corals, soft neutrals) make tech feel more approachable.[1][3][6]"
      ]
    }
  },

  "recommended_grayscale": {
    "scale": {
      "gray_0": "#FFFFFF",
      "gray_50": "#F9FAFB",
      "gray_100": "#F3F4F6",
      "gray_200": "#E5E7EB",
      "gray_300": "#D1D5DB",
      "gray_400": "#9CA3AF",
      "gray_500": "#6B7280",
      "gray_600": "#4B5563",
      "gray_700": "#374151",
      "gray_800": "#1F2933",
      "gray_900": "#111827"
    },
    "usage": {
      "light_mode_bg": ["#FFFFFF", "#F9FAFB", "#F3F4F6"],
      "light_mode_text": ["#111827", "#1F2933", "#374151"],
      "dark_mode_bg": ["#020617", "#0B1120", "#111827"],
      "dark_mode_text": ["#E5E7EB", "#F3F4F6", "#FFFFFF"]
    },
    "wcag_notes": [
      "Gray_800–900 text on Gray_0–100 background comfortably exceeds AA and typically AAA for body text.",
      "Gray_50–100 text on Gray_800–900 backgrounds is suitable for dark mode body and UI text.",
      "Reserve Gray_300 or lighter primarily for borders/dividers, not body text, to preserve contrast."
    ]
  },

  "palettes": [
    {
      "name": "Futuristic SaaS Indigo (Light + Dark)",
      "style": "Tech-forward, trustworthy, gradient-friendly SaaS/blog UI with strong blues/indigos.[1][3][5]",
      "light_mode": {
        "background_primary": "#F9FAFF",
        "background_alt": "#EDF2FF",
        "surface": "#FFFFFF",
        "text_primary": "#0F172A",
        "text_muted": "#6B7280",
        "primary": "#2563EB",
        "primary_soft": "#DBEAFE",
        "accent": "#6366F1",
        "accent_soft": "#E0E7FF",
        "link": "#1D4ED8",
        "border_subtle": "#E5E7EB",
        "border_strong": "#CBD5F5",
        "feedback": {
          "success": "#16A34A",
          "success_soft": "#DCFCE7",
          "warning": "#CA8A04",
          "warning_soft": "#FEF3C7",
          "error": "#DC2626",
          "error_soft": "#FEE2E2"
        }
      },
      "dark_mode": {
        "background_primary": "#020617",
        "background_alt": "#0B1120",
        "surface": "#020617",
        "surface_raised": "#111827",
        "text_primary": "#E5E7EB",
        "text_muted": "#9CA3AF",
        "primary": "#60A5FA",
        "primary_soft": "#1D3557",
        "accent": "#818CF8",
        "accent_soft": "#1E293B",
        "link": "#93C5FD",
        "border_subtle": "#1E293B",
        "border_strong": "#334155",
        "feedback": {
          "success": "#4ADE80",
          "success_soft": "#14532D",
          "warning": "#FACC15",
          "warning_soft": "#422006",
          "error": "#F97373",
          "error_soft": "#450A0A"
        }
      },
      "wcag_notes": {
        "body_text_on_bg": "Text_primary on background_primary in both modes is designed to exceed WCAG AA (and often AAA) for normal text when using the deep neutrals listed.[4][5]",
        "primary_on_bg": "Primary on light backgrounds and its lighter tints on dark backgrounds should be checked, but combinations like #2563EB on #FFFFFF and #60A5FA on #020617 typically meet
